content.prompt: In the xy-plane, two points are close together on the graph of an implicitly defined function. The graph includes these two points and a vertical line segment connecting them. Which of the following is true?

choices.label: The rate of change of y with respect to x is positive on the portion of the graph between the two points.
The rate of change of x with respect to y is positive on the portion of the graph between the two points.
The rate of change of y with respect to x is 0 on the portion of the graph between the two points.
The rate of change of x with respect to y is 0 on the portion of the graph between the two points.

unit.text: 4: Functions Involving Parameters, Vectors, and Matrices (Not assessed on the AP Exam)

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe the characteristics of a function with varying levels of precision, depending on the function representation and available mathematical tools.
